steps.name: CypherCommand
commands: call apoc.periodic.iterate("MATCH(e:esco__Occupation)-[]-(l:skosxl__Label) WHERE NOT EXISTS(l.skosxl__literalForm) AND EXISTS(l.esco__hasLabelRole) unwind keys(l) as p with l, count(p) as pCount WHERE pCount = 2 return l", "DETACH DELETE l", {batchSize:10000}) yield batches, total return batches, total

call apoc.periodic.iterate("MATCH(l:skosxl__Label) WHERE EXISTS(l.uri) unwind keys(l) AS p WITH l, count(p) AS pCount WHERE pCount = 1 return l", "DETACH DELETE l", {batchSize:10000}) yield batches, total return batches, total
